text: Piotrowice () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Bystrzyca Kłodzka, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in southwestern Poland. Prior to 1945, it was in Germany. It lies approximately northeast of Bystrzyca Kłodzka, south of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital, Wrocław. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Piotrowice, Kłodzko County
